mapper.select: select a.ano, /*경매 번호*/ seller, /*판매자 회원번호*/ s.mid as sellerNm, /*판매자 아이디*/ title, /*판매 제목*/ content, /*판매내용*/ vcate, /*카테고리*/ pay_start, /*판매 시작가*/ start_day, /*판매 시작일*/ last_day, /*판매 종료일*/ att.bidding as pay_max, /*최고가*/ att.buyer as buyer, /*낙찰자 회원번호*/ b.mid as buyerNm, /*낙찰자 아이디*/ status /*판매 상태*/ from auction a left join user s on a.seller = s.mno left join video v on a.ano = v.ano left join (SELECT ano, MAX(bidding) as bidding FROM attend GROUP BY ano) a1 on a1.ano = a.ano left join attend att on a1.ano = att.ano and att.bidding = a1.bidding left join user b on att.buyer = b.mno where a.status = '판매종료' and att.buyer = #{buyer} order by a.ano desc LIMIT #{start}, #{end}
